thread.title: Trump has a new target: Bernie Sanders

author: Alanna Durkin and Jill Colvin, Associated Press
title: Trump has a new target: Bernie Sanders
text: Photo: Steve Helber, AP Republican presidential hopeful Donald Trump gestures during a speech to supporters at a rally in Richmond, Va., Wednesday, Oct. 14, 2015. Republican presidential hopeful Donald Trump gestures during a... RICHMOND, Virginia (AP) — Republican presidential front-runner Donald Trump has a new target for his barbs: Democratic contender Bernie Sanders. Republican presidential hopeful Donald Trump gestures during a speech to supporters at a rally in Richmond, Va., Wednesday, Oct. 14, 2015. Republican presidential hopeful Donald Trump gestures during a... RICHMOND, Virginia (AP) — Republican presidential front-runner Donald Trump has a new target for his barbs: Democratic contender Bernie Sanders.
